entry.title: CURL 用法小记
entry.summary: 输出状态码以及抛弃多余的信息 -w "%{http_code}\n" -o /dev/null 指定域名解析地址 --resolve *:443:${ip} 指定请求IP协议 --ipv4 --ipv6 参数 -s 寂静模式 -I 只输出请求头信息 -m 超时时间 -o /dev/null /dev/null是一个空设备，向其输出将抛弃这些数据。
entry.content:
输出状态码以及抛弃多余的信息

-w "%{http_code}\n" -o /dev/null

指定域名解析地址

--resolve *:443:${ip}

指定请求IP协议

--ipv4
--ipv6

参数

-s 寂静模式 
-I 只输出请求头信息
-m 超时时间

-o /dev/null

/dev/null是一个空设备，向其输出将抛弃这些数据。

entry.title: Windows手动安装驱动
entry.summary: 对于一些OEM驱动提供的是压缩文件，且解压展示为.inf文件来说，手动安装驱动时候，使用iigd_dch.inf即可。
entry.content: 对于一些OEM驱动提供的是压缩文件，且解压展示为.inf文件来说，手动安装驱动时候，使用iigd_dch.inf即可。

entry.title: How to watch netflix 4k with Edge
entry.summary: 4k screen is necessary A 4K resolution screen is required. Make sure your screen resolution is 3840x2160. In this step you need to open: edge://flags/ and search ready,you will see the option PlayReady DRM for Windows make sure is Enabled. You need to install hevc…
entry.content:
4k screen is necessary

A 4K resolution screen is required. Make sure your screen resolution is 3840x2160.

Setting Edge

In this step you need to open:

edge://flags/

and search ready,you will see the option PlayReady DRM for Windows make sure is Enabled.

Install HEVC

You need to install hevc video expansion from Microsoft Store. HEVC is a crucial expansion.

Check you Netflix

Make sure your package supports and enables 4K playback.

Now, you success

Just restart Edge, and open Netflix you will see 4k label.

entry.title: Docker 基础命令
entry.content: Docker基础命令

entry.title: 开启Crontab日志
entry.summary: modify config # vi /etc/rsyslog.conf 将 #cron.* /var/log/cron.log 变为 cron.* /var/log/cron.log Restart service # /etc/init.d/rsyslog restart 环境变量以及参考 https://www.cnblogs.com/yinkh/p/5757849.html https://www.cnblogs.com/grefr/p/6095013.html
entry.content:
modify config

# vi /etc/rsyslog.conf

将

#cron.* /var/log/cron.log

变为

cron.* /var/log/cron.log

Restart service

# /etc/init.d/rsyslog restart

环境变量以及参考

https://www.cnblogs.com/yinkh/p/5757849.html https://www.cnblogs.com/grefr/p/6095013.html

entry.title: Openwrt 格式化U盘、硬盘
entry.summary: 安装软件 opkg update opkg install e4fsprogs lsblk 查看硬盘命令 df -h ls /dev/sd* lsblk 格式化 确定硬盘符后 mkfs.ext4 /dev/xxx 其他参考 https://www.cnblogs.com/clphp/p/6399119.html https://openwrt.org/packages/pkgdata/lsblk
entry.content:
安装软件

opkg update
opkg install e4fsprogs lsblk

查看硬盘命令

df -h
ls /dev/sd*
lsblk

格式化

确定硬盘符后

mkfs.ext4 /dev/xxx

其他参考

https://www.cnblogs.com/clphp/p/6399119.html https://openwrt.org/packages/pkgdata/lsblk

entry.title: Github Action Self hosted 配置问题
entry.summary: Must not run with sudo 您可以通过创建用户来解决或者如下: 修改 ./config.sh 内容 vi ./config.sh 删除这部分 if [ $user_id -eq 0 -a -z "$AGENT_ALLOW_RUNASROOT" ]; then echo "Must not run with sudo" exit 1 fi 或者在命令前部添加： RUNNER_ALLOW_RUNASROOT="1" 参考 https://stackoverflow.com/questions/66085793/must-not-run-with-sudo# https://www.cnblogs.com/mingyanzhen/p/11361207.html https://bit.ly/3IqkOKW 参考 https://dev.classmethod.jp/articles/setup-python-on-self-hosted-runner/ https://github.com/actions/setup-python/issues/92 https://github.com/actions/setup-python/issues/96
entry.content:
Must not run with sudo

您可以通过创建用户来解决或者如下:

修改 ./config.sh 内容

vi ./config.sh

删除这部分

if [ $user_id -eq 0 -a -z "$AGENT_ALLOW_RUNASROOT" ]; then
    echo "Must not run with sudo"
    exit 1
fi

或者在命令前部添加：

RUNNER_ALLOW_RUNASROOT="1"

参考

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/66085793/must-not-run-with-sudo# https://www.cnblogs.com/mingyanzhen/p/11361207.html https://bit.ly/3IqkOKW

Version 3.x with arch x64 not found

参考

https://dev.classmethod.jp/articles/setup-python-on-self-hosted-runner/
https://github.com/actions/setup-python/issues/92
https://github.com/actions/setup-python/issues/96

entry.title: Github Action 执行完毕GIT到仓库
entry.summary: 公开仓库 - uses: actions/checkout@v2 with: ref: main token: ${{ secrets.token }} 若是私人仓库 你需要先创建属于你的github token，并设置为Actions secrets。 然后这样使用 - uses: actions/checkout@v2 with: ref: main token: ${{ secrets.token }} 当程序执行完毕 若文件已经更改，这样可以GIT到仓库 - name: Commit files uses: stefanzweifel/git-auto-commit-action@v4 with: commit_message: Action Commit push_options: --force 完整示例 name: 'test' on: #…
entry.content:
公开仓库

      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
        with:
          ref: main
          token: ${{ secrets.token }}

若是私人仓库

你需要先创建属于你的github token，并设置为Actions secrets。 然后这样使用

      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
        with:
          ref: main
          token: ${{ secrets.token }}

当程序执行完毕

若文件已经更改，这样可以GIT到仓库

      - name: Commit files
        uses: stefanzweifel/git-auto-commit-action@v4
        with:
          commit_message: Action Commit
          push_options: --force

完整示例

name: 'test'
on:
  # push:
  #   branches:
  #     - main
  workflow_dispatch:
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 */3 * * *'
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
        with:
          ref: main
          token: ${{ secrets.token }}
      - name: Setup Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v2
      - name: Run Python
        run: python test.py
      - name: Commit files
        uses: stefanzweifel/git-auto-commit-action@v4
        with:
          commit_message: Action Commit
          push_options: --force

文档

https://github.com/stefanzweifel/git-auto-commit-action

entry.title: Python Telegram 库
entry.summary: Python html to telegra.ph poster https://pypi.org/project/html-telegraph-poster/ Simple python function to post plain html text to https://telegra.ph/. Telegra.ph allows <a>, <blockquote>, <br>, <em>, <figure>, <h3>, <h4>, <img>, <p>, <strong>, elements. It also supports embedded youtube and vimeo iframe tags.
entry.content:
Python html to telegra.ph poster

https://pypi.org/project/html-telegraph-poster/

Simple python function to post plain html text to https://telegra.ph/. Telegra.ph allows <a>, <blockquote>, <br>, <em>, <figure>, <h3>, <h4>, <img>, <p>, <strong>, elements. It also supports embedded youtube and vimeo iframe tags.
